attributes.action: Make leaving the EU on WTO terms / "No Deal" official government policy.
attributes.additional_details:
We, as citizens of the UK, accept the alleged risks of disruption to aspects of society that leaving the EU on WTO terms may cause, including to our jobs and the wider economy. We also understand the benefits of being an agile, independently governed, sovereign nation and cherish the responsibility of our own destiny.
The electoral majority, individually voted "Leave" for different reasons in the 2016 referendum, but they collectively voted FOR change. Change is impossible in a perpetual stasis.
attributes.background: It is forthwith time to collectively move forward as a nation, in a way that genuinely honours the result of largest democratic exercise the UK has ever undertaken. We reject the negotiated Withdrawal Agreement. Leaving the EU on WTO terms, or "No Deal", is our preferred option.
